languages.text: {n}Лицо нищего перекашивается, и он неожиданно сильным пинком отбивает ваш пистолет в сторону. Вы вцепляетесь в его руку, и несостоявшаяся перестрелка перетекает в жестокую рукопашную...{/n}

{n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо нищего перекашивается, и он неожиданно сильным пинком отбивает ваш пистолет в сторону. Вы вцепляетесь в его руку, и несостоявшаяся перестрелка перетекает в жестокую рукопашную...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

{n}The vagabond's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

{n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

{n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞食の顔が怒りでゆがむ。驚くほど強烈な蹴りで、あなたの手からピストルを叩き落とした。あなたは彼の手にしがみつき、銃撃戦に代わる、激しい格闘となる…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食の顔が怒りでゆがむ。驚くほど強烈な蹴りで、あなたの手からピストルを叩き落とした。あなたは彼の手にしがみつき、銃撃戦に代わる、激しい格闘となる…{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞丐的脸扭曲着，充满了怒意。他猛地一脚踢了过来，踢掉了你手里的手枪，你也抓住了他的手。原本的枪战变成了一场激烈的肉搏……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐的脸扭曲着，充满了怒意。他猛地一脚踢了过来，踢掉了你手里的手枪，你也抓住了他的手。原本的枪战变成了一场激烈的肉搏……{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rostro del mendigo se desfigura por la ira. Te quita la pistola de la mano con una patada sorprendentemente fuerte. Te agarras a su mano y el tiroteo se convierte en una lucha encarnizada...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del mendigo se desfigura por la ira. Te quita la pistola de la mano con una patada sorprendentemente fuerte. Te agarras a su mano y el tiroteo se convierte en una lucha encarnizada...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Bettlers ist wutverzerrt. Mit einem überraschend starken Tritt befördert er die Pistole aus deiner Hand. Du packst seine Hand, und aus der vermeintlichen Schießerei wird ein erbitterter Faustkampf ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Bettlers ist wutverzerrt. Mit einem überraschend starken Tritt befördert er die Pistole aus deiner Hand. Du packst seine Hand, und aus der vermeintlichen Schießerei wird ein erbitterter Faustkampf ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les traits tordus par la fureur, le mendiant vous décoche un puissant coup de pied qui fait s'envoler votre arme. Vous vous jetez alors sur ses mains, et ce qui aurait dû être une fusillade se transforme en véritable pugilat...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's face contorts with anger. With a surprisingly strong kick, he knocks the pistol out of your hand. You latch onto his hand, and the would-be gunfight turns into a fierce struggle...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traits tordus par la fureur, le mendiant vous décoche un puissant coup de pied qui fait s'envoler votre arme. Vous vous jetez alors sur ses mains, et ce qui aurait dû être une fusillade se transforme en véritable pugilat...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dilencinin yüzü öfkeyle buruşuyor. Şaşırtıcı derecede güçlü bir tekmeyle tabancanı elinden düşürüyor. Eline asılıyorsun ve silah çatışması bir anda vahşi bir dövüşe dönüşüyor.{/n}
